item.description:
Day/Date: Tuesday, March 28th 
Time: 07:00pm 
Future meetings: Once every two months 
Location: Panera Bread- 201 Brookline Ave. Boston, MA 
Price: FREE 
Description: 
Local Outings is a group for people who love getting out and exploring our 
natural world, through trips and conservation. We encourage our members to not only go on trips but get involved in other aspects of Sierra Club, whether that 
is Inner City outings (volunteering with youth), lobbying for protection of 
natural resources, or projects of conversation. If this sound like something 
that you are interested in, come join our group. 
Contact name Joe Walz, 508- 726-2427 (work cell) e-mail: joejoewalz@gmail.com
item.how_to_find_us: Take a left inside, go up the stairs we will be in close proximity to the fireplace in Panera
item.why: Come meet the group, this is where we decide what trips we want to embark upon. Bring your trip ideas and sense of adventure.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Sierra Club Outings Meeting
